text_block_list.text: Early in the morning during the summer training camp, I somehow woke up and went outside to see…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ba-ku-shin… Ba-ku-shin……!
A Sakura Bakushin O jogging.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oya! Trainer-san! Good morning!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Yes! I'm very admirable!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: As the model class president for Uma Musume everywhere, waking up early is a given!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Sleeping through the night with the lights out, waking up with the sun in the morning. And doing your voluntary training before anyone else!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: It's only by showing everyone who I am that I can gain their high esteem!
Even during the training camp, she's looking out for others and trying to set a good example. Her attitude is honestly wonderful.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: So, Trainer-san, please take lots of pictures of me!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I'd like to post it in the hallway of the camp as an example of a "Model Honors Student"!
I have a feeling that this course of action is a little―no, actually, a lot―wrong.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: That aside! Trainer-san, let's do some Spartan training, please!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Since this is our long-awaited training camp, I thought we might want to make it an exemplary one!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: In other words――Spartan training! And I, being intelligent, have realized this!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: So please, by all means, let's train without holding anything back!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: She trained harder than anyone else, drinking away every last drop of the mud, tears, and sweat…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: And so! I'm going to become an even more amazing class president!!
It's good that she's motivated, anyways. A Spartan training that she might enjoy would be…
choice_data_list: Swimming to her limits in the ocean!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Lifting logs…!?
choice_data_list: (Was that as stupid as I thought it was?)
(Was that as stupid as I thought it was?)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: ……Good! That's good, Trainer-san!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: It's suuuuuuper Spartan!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I'm going to Bakushin to the forest right now!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hm… Hmhmhmhm……!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: There are… no logs!? The trees, they're all so lively!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Could it be that I…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ackk―! If I don't knock the tree down, a log won't be brought into this world!?
If things continue like this, it seems they'll only get increasingly more absurd, but when I tried to tell her to rein it in――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ah―――!! I've come up with an excellent idea!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san will be a tree!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: So, I'll lift you up!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Here I gooo―!
After that, we got into a scuffle for a while……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: To the limit! That's truly Spartan!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Understood, let's do it! I'll use my Bakushin・Guts!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Now, let's push the limits!! I'll swim to the end of the horizon!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Affirmative! I've stopped!
I'm sure she'd seriously swim to the end of the ocean. That's dangerous…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Roger!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: ―Wait, I'm not going to swim in shallow water!
choice_data_list: Class presidents can swim in shallow water!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Now that you mention it―! And also, there's nothing I can't do.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: All right, I'll swim to my limits in the shallows!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Bakushiiiiin!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Well, the shallows are roughly about here……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ah, you there, you just crossed in front of me!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Yes, that crab! You've got some nerve challenging me to a showdown!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Bring it on!!
After that, I kept an eye on Sakura Bakushin O while she frolicked in the waves for a while……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hah, haa……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: To the limit, I endured….! The onslaught of crabs!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: The training was quite spartan, but I managed to get through it!
The purpose of the program changed halfway through, but at any rate, it seems to have helped her grow?
